mapper.sql: id, user_id, name, tel, city, address, is_default, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: select id, user_id, name, tel, city, address, is_default from user_address where user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY is_default DESC
select id, user_id, name, tel, city, address, is_default from user_address where user_id = #{userId} and is_default = 1
mapper.update: update user_address set is_default = 0 where user_id = #{userId} and is_default = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_address (user_id, name, tel, city, address, is_default, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES(#{userID},#{name},#{tel},#{city},#{address},#{is_default},#{gmt_create},#{gmt_modified})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user_address
id,
user_id,
name,
tel,
city,
address,
is_default,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,

mapper.update:
update user_address
user_id = #{user_id},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_default = #{is_default,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gmt_create = #{gmt_create,jdbcType=BIGINT},
gmt_modified = #{gmt_modified,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_address set user_id = #{user_id}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_default = #{is_default,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmt_create,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_modified = #{gmt_modified,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
